import "../App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; function BookAppointment() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ doctor: "", date: "", time: "", reason: "" }); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/appointments/book", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization: localStorage.getItem("token"), }, body: JSON.stringify(form), }); alert("Appointment booked"); }; return (

Book Doctor Appointment

); } export default BookAppointment;
